casebody.data:
FRANCIS B. HEGEMAN, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. MARY A. CANTRELL, Defendant, Appellant. Decided June 25, 1877.

Before Speir and Freedman, JJ.

Appeal from a special term order denying defendant’s motion for leave to make and serve a proposed case and exceptions. Henry H. Morange, for appellant. A. H. Wagner, for respondent. Per Curiam.

—Order affirmed with costs and disbursements.
